items.title: stuffed avocado
items.descript: red cabbage, arugula and acorn squash with a horse radish and sunflower sauce.

items.title: brussel sprout salad
items.descript: shaved brussel sprouts, apples and walnuts. with a lemon thyme vinaigrette.

items.title: zucchini ravioli
items.descript: thinly sliced zucchini filled with cashew and butter nut squash cream topped with sage and black pepper olive oil.

items.title: crispy kale chips
items.descript: green kale leaves tossed in pumpkinseed butter and sea salt then dehydrated until crispy.

items.title: accorn squash and leek tart
items.descript: with a sunflower seed, carrot crust and celeriac cream, topped with arugula and served with a savoy cabbage and apple slaw.

items.title: portobello burrito
items.descript: marinated portobello with spicy almond meat, avocado, lettuce, and cashew sour cream. served with cauliflower rice and fresh tomato salsa.

items.title: tomato and pesto flatbread
items.descript: dehydrated flax and vegetable crust, sun dried tomato marinara, chopped spinach and pumpkin seed pesto, sunflower seed cheese and fresh tomato.

items.title: coconut green bean noodles
items.descript: bean thread noodles made of green beans and green peas with cauliflower, broccoli, zucchini, carrots and spinach with a coconut, ginger and cumin seed broth.

items.title: russian chili
items.descript: beets, black beans, cabbage and tomato with smoked paprika, chili and cumin. served with brown rice and cashew sour cream or local goat cheese.

items.title: vegetable rice bowl
items.descript: brown rice, sauteed zucchini, broccoli, carrots and mushrooms with pickled vegetables and a fried egg. topped with a tahini sauce.

items.title: irish stew
items.descript: sweet potato, red potato, kale, green lentils, gluten free beer, chickpea rosemary and thyme. served with a gluten free oat muffin.

items.title: winter bean salad
items.descript: warm chickpeas, black beans, and green lentils tossed with fresh kale red onion spinach and cabbage and a rosemary vinaigrette.

items.title: huge gardan salad
items.descript: mixed organic greens, carrots, kale, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, and sunflower seeds.

items.title: lemon and cashew mousse
items.descript: almond and lavender cookies and fresh fruit.

items.title: cream filled chocolate cake
items.descript: caramel cream, hazelnut cake and a black cherry sauce.

items.title: cinnamon chia seed pudding
items.descript: with fruit and local bee boy honey. nut free.
